 Soul Of The Universe is the first independent album release by Cosmic Replicant, following previously released albums on Altar Records and Supersensitive from Pureuphoria Records. This album was inspired by dreams, thoughts, and experiences as well as by the works of various musicians, artists, film directors, science fiction writers, and life itself.
 The intention is to give a listener a joyful listening experience while being guided into a dreamlike state of mind.
